mapper.select: select code,item1 from sys_dict where dic_name =#{dicname};
select gatcode,gatvalue from gat_check_common_dict where dic_name ='文化程度_公安厅' and sqcode is null;
SELECT * FROM gat_check_common_dict WHERE dic_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%\_公安厅') ESCAPE '\'
mapper.update:
UPDATE gat_check_common_dict
sqcode = #{sqcode},
sqvalue = #{sqvalue},
WHERE gatcode = #{gatcode}
